nodes.text: Trimpian was a tangy finger food capable of getting stuck in close-set teeth. It could be served with miasra sauce. The odd taste was believed by some to be a sign that the meal made the eater's skin slightly flame retardant.
Trimpian appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
